channel.title: Tor Browser - Stricter Defaults - Security Slider Level Highest
channel.description: Hello, Currently we ship Tor-browser with default settings which is fine for normal usage, however since if somebody bothered to set-up whonix it means they want the highest level of security and thus making tor browser default to Safest mode by default should help a lot

item.title: Tor Browser - Stricter Defaults - Security Slider Level Highest

item.title: Tor Browser - Stricter Defaults - Security Slider Level Highest
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
That is the decision by The Tor Project, the developers of Tor Browser.

It would be nice to change this at the Whonix level but difficult to implement. Same answer as here applies:
UBlock Origin and the "Safest" tor browser setting - #2 by Patrick

Read full topic
